Pre-Game Insights: Atlanta Braves manager Brian Snitker made an unusual pitching change, inserting closer Raisel Iglesias into the eighth inning in search of a 4-out save.
The Braves need to treat Wednesday's contest in Minnesota with the same urgency as Tuesday's game, despite the series already being in their favor.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Braves remain six games behind the Philadelphia Phillies in the NL East and still have only a three-game lead on the New York Mets for the final NL wild card spot.
The Braves had a chance to sweep the Washington Nationals over last weekend but failed to win the series finale, which is why they sit six games back of the Phillies instead of only five.
Others: The Braves need to win three of four this weekend to have a realistic shot at catching the Phillies.
The MLB season is approaching the home stretch, where every game can determine a division winner or who plays October baseball.
